Thank you for your Zoom Room reservation request. You will receive an e-mail copy of your request. A Library staff member will reply within 48 hours (during normal business hours, i.e. Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.). If you do not hear from a staff member by that time, please contact the room booking coordinator, Stephanie Crooks, at 243-8788 or sac3m@virginia.edu.

Request another room reservation.

Please be sure to logout of NetBadge after you have finished making your Library service requests.
